forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 26. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 7am and 2pm, then a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy. High near 38, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 7pm, then a slight chance of snow between 7pm and 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. North northeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
